title: Image Understanding
description: Evaluate object recognition, spatial reasoning, and fine-grained visual detail extraction. Test robustness under image noise, cropping, rotations, and occlusions. Include evaluation of diagram understanding and chart/graph interpretation.

title: OCR & Text Extraction
description: Test accuracy under real-world conditions: glare, low resolution, handwriting. Distinguish between OCR accuracy and semantic interpretation accuracy. Evaluate multilingual OCR performance.

title: Data Extraction
description: Test structured extraction from complex images (invoices, tables, forms). Measure consistency in layout reconstruction tasks. Evaluate grounding between visual elements and textual references.

title: Latency
description: Benchmark both image processing time and multimodal generation time. Measure impact of image size and resolution on throughput. Compare GPU vs CPU performance for real-time applications.
